item.description: Update Correction - Structure Fire; INC#0436; 08:45AM; 1005 N Tremont St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39BZg22; #BoyleHeights; Address Corrected from 2671 E Ganahl Street to 1005 N Tremont Street. Fire cause remains under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E2 E201 E202 E25 E4 E47 RA1 RA2 RA801 T1 T2; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0436; 08:25AM; 2671 E Ganahl St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y1ZI2N; #BoyleHeights; 32 Firefighters took just 15 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in an exterior shed fire that extended into one room of a one-story residential duplex. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E2 E201 E202 E25 E4 E47 RA1 RA2 RA801 T1 T2; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0436; 08:10AM; 2671 E Ganahl St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y1ZI2N; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Outside shed fire extended into one room of a one-story residential duplex.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E2 E201 E202 E25 E4 E47 RA2 RA801 T1 T2; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#0342; 06:31AM; 3909 S Hill St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39D8yL5; #HistoricSouthCentral; 2 vehicle collision. 4 patients total: Adult Male (Serious Condition), Adult Female (Fair Condition), Male Toddler (Good Condition) from one sedan. Adult female (Fair Condition) from the other sedan. No entrapment. All taken to area hospitals by LAFD Paramedics: Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #836); FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E215 EM1 EM11 RA10 RA14 RA15 RA246 RA46 RA815 T15; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0337; 06:28AM; 6925 S La Cienega Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N3vS28; #Westchester; PRELIM: Four vehicle collision. Two patients total: Adult female was trapped in the wreckage of her badly damaged vehicle. Beyond medical assistance, she was determined deceased at scene. An adult male from another vehicle with non-life threatening injuries, is being transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes of La Cienega Boulevard in the immediate area until LAPD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #832) and Coroner; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E266 E295 E66 EM9 HR3 RA5 RA95 T5 T66 T95 UR88; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1732; 10:39PM; 10740 N Vanalden Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tI7f4c; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: LAFD Firefighters and Paramedics are working to free a critically injured female driver trapped in the wreckage of pickup truck that collided with tree. She is expected to be transported to an area trauma center. No other patients. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #4573); FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E287 E70 E8 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA70 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0521; 10:04AM; 1543 W 70th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HJvvZT; Harvard Park; It took 30 firefighters 12 minutes to extinguish the flames consuming a detached two-car garage and auto inside. No spread to nearby structures. No reported injury. Cause under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E215 E266 E33 RA57 RA866 T15 T64; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0521; 09:52AM; 1543 W 70th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HJvvZT; Harvard Park; Detached garage to the rear, fully engulfed in flames.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E215 E266 E33 RA57 RA866 T15 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1557; 08:38PM; 9900 N Winnetka Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MU7ZKj; Chatsworth; A multi-vehicle collision resulted in LAFD firefighters performing a physical extrication operation, and transporting two patients in at least serious condition. Sadly, one victim was killed in the crash. LAPD #4192.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E104 E107 E28 E296 EM17 HR3 RA107 RA70 RA73 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Vehicle vs Structure; INC#1483; 07:57PM; 256 E 95th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zGzFPX; #BroadwayManchester; *Tentative Address* One vehicle collided with a two-story residential structure, compromising the integrity of the building, and cutting off access to the staircase leading from the second floor (occupied). One non-ambulatory person will be rescued via litter basket, and the other occupants will be guided down the aerial ladder, as their only path of egress (stairs) has been damaged and blocked. Thankfully, no reported injuries. LAPD Inc #4028. Building and Safety notified/responding.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E21 E221 RA246 RA264 T21; CH4; Nicholas Prange
